smart_goals.description: Reduce daily carbohydrate intake to 45g per meal for the next 2 weeks, as documented in the food log.
Take prescribed Metformin medication twice a day, before breakfast and dinner, for the next month.
Perform a minimum of 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic activity or 75 minutes of vigorous-intensity aerobic activity per week, as recorded in the activity log.
Monitor and log daily blood glucose levels before meals and after dinner, aiming to keep levels below 180mg/dL, for the following month.
